name: Apple MacBook Air 2020 (M1, 13.3 Inch, 8GB, 256GB, macOS Big Sur, Space Grey)

prod_desc.heading: Why Buy Apple MacBook Air 2020
features: 13.3-inch Retina Display enables you to view every content with perfect clarity
256GB SSD helps you to store all your files, videos, pictures, games, etc
8GB RAM Performance empowers you to do multitasking without any fear of lagging and works smoothly
Apple M1 Chip Processor enables you to use it with ease
sub_features: Your efficiency levels will be on point as the Apple MacBook Air 2020 features a new look loaded with so many specifications. It blends functionality with style packing in an awesome look with efficient performance. The macOS Big Sur operating system and powerful Processor help you perform your regular activities along with fun games. It has a powerful storage capacity and efficient RAM which lets you store a huge amount of important data and enjoy lag-free operation respectively. The 13.3-inch Retina display allows you to enjoy watching videos and playing games a more enjoyable experience. The MacBook has set standards in computing thanks to its Apple M1 chip Processor. It has an 8-Core CPU with 4 performÂ­ance cores and 4 efficiency cores, 8-core GPU, and 16-core Neural Engine. The processor variant is Big Sur. The superbly fast processor takes your productivity, creativity, and gaming to a whole new level and never lets you slow down so that the quality and quantity of your work are never compromised. The 8GB RAM (Unified Memory) makes sure you can multitask between different tabs providing you with lightning-fast responsiveness for an amazing user experience. It gives you a delightful gaming experience. This MacBook is full of amazing specifications.

The Apple MacBook Air 2020's price is quite a bargain, making this an affordable buy. With the huge amount of workload and data involved in today's world, it may get difficult at times to keep all data safe for current or future use stored due to average storage capacities. It comes with a serious storage capacity which helps you to save your contents. It has 256GB SSD to make it more efficient and productive which lets you store your important official data and videos, songs, and photos for your leisure. Play like a pro and watch movies on this laptop for experiencing first-class audio and visual experience where the quality of your entertainment is not compromised. Enjoy watching videos and viewing photos like never before with the 13.3-inch (diagonal) LED-backlit display with IPS technology which ensures you never miss out on a detail. The resolution is 2560 x 1600 pixels native resolution at 227 pixels per inch with support for millions of colors. This MacBook is an extremely convenient choice for modern tech-oriented people. Built-in 49.9-watt-hour lithium-polymer battery. It offers up to 15 hours of wireless web, and up to 18 hours of Apple TV app movie playback. Comes with 30 Watt USB-C Power Adapter. Has Backlit Magic Keyboard. Comes with an Ambient light sensor. Force Touch trackpad for precise cursor control and pressure-sensing capabilities; enables Force clicks, accelerators, pressure-sensitive drawing, and Multi-Touch gestures. It also has a Touch ID sensor. Equipped with a 720p FaceTime HD camera. Comes with Stereo speakers. Offers wide stereo sound. Support for Dolby Atmos playback. Has a three-mic array with directional beamforming, and a 0.35 cm headphone jack. So, go ahead and book the Apple MacBook Air 2020 online, right away!

faqs.que: Where can I purchase the AppleCare Protection Plan?
faqs.ans: he AppleCare Protection Plan is available at the Apple Online Store and many Apple-authorised resellers and wireless service providers.

faqs.que: Is the AppleCare Protection Plan transferable?
faqs.ans: Yes. If you choose to sell or give away your Apple product, you can also transfer the ownership of the AppleCare Protection Plan. Please see the Terms and Conditions for complete details.

faqs.que: When I purchase the AppleCare Protection Plan, do I need to register it?
faqs.ans: In most cases, if you purchase the AppleCare Protection Plan at the same time as your Apple hardware from selected Apple resellers, you will not need to register it as your AppleCare agreement will be automatically registered.

faqs.que: Is Apple laptop faster than Windows?
faqs.ans: PCs slow down more than Macs because of major differences between the operating systems. Unlike Windows, macOS doesn't have a registry filled with keys from unused programs that slow down the computer. Moreover, macOS is better optimized for Mac hardware and gets less malware.
